comment.author: 30207865@N03
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Photografica, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 98338006@N00
comment._content:
wonderful sharp prints!
This shows the better-off Dutch sniffing some salt sea-air. It's not about sitting in the sun - having a white complexion showed you did'nt belong to the working class.
